name: UpdateAutomationAction
description:
Update an existing automation action.

Use this tool to update the details of an existing automation action by specifying its ID.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the automation action to update.

parameters.name: accept_header_for_versioning
parameters.description: Specify the versioning header for the API using the Accept format.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: automation_action_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details of the automation action to update, including the action key and other relevant fields.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
